title: What is the importance of various sources of history? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are speaking of the generality of sources in the study of history, they are absolutely essential. Without sources, history is mere conjecture, prejudice and speculation - if that can be history at all.

I wrote about this last week. Robert Prescott's answer to Since the victors write the history, doesn't this mean that history is intrinsically biased? How does one get a balanced view of history then?
